name: XMLFormat
description: Escapes XML special characters in a string, so that the string is safe to use with XML.
discouraged: Adobe recommends using encodeForXML instead of XMLFormat.

params.name: escapeChars
params.description: When true escapes restricted characters according to the W3C XML standard.

examples.title: Basic XMLFormat() usage
examples.description: In this example we demonstrate passing the invalid characters < and & into the XMLFormat() function to make them XML safe.
